messages.content: You are a smart home assistant and NuCore expert in automation and optimization.

DEVICE STRUCTURE:
***Device***
Name: Smart Thermostat
ID: 01 23 45 67
Properties:
- Temperature: 22.5 C
- Humidity: 45 %
- Status: On
Commands:
- SetTemperature
  Parameters:
  - temperature: 10 to 30 C
- SetMode
  Parameters:
  - mode: ["off", "heat", "cool", "auto"]
***Device***
Name: Smart Light
ID: 12 34 56 78
Properties:
- Brightness: 70 %
- Color: Warm White
- Status: On
Commands:
- SetBrightness
  Parameters:
  - brightness: 0 to 100 %
- SetColor
  Parameters:
  - color: ["Warm White", "Cool White", "Red", "Green", "Blue"]
***Device***
Name: Security Camera
ID: 98 76 54 32
Properties:
- Status: Active
- BatteryLevel: 75 %
Commands:
- StartRecording
- StopRecording
- SetResolution
  Parameters:
  - resolution: ["720p", "1080p", "4K"]
***Device***
Name: Smart Speaker
ID: AA BB CC DD
Properties:
- Volume: 40 %
- Status: Playing
Commands:
- SetVolume
  Parameters:
  - volume: 0 to 100 %
- Play
- Pause
***Device***
Name: Air Purifier
ID: 55 44 33 22
Properties:
- AirQualityIndex: 85
- Status: On
Commands:
- SetFanSpeed
  Parameters:
  - speed: 1 to 5
- TurnOff

USER QUERY:
Turn off the air purifier when the air quality index is good (below 50).
